Generation VII.Sun: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.
Generation VII.Moon: This Pokémon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: If a child it has made friends with is bullied, Drampa will find the bully's house and burn it to the ground.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It appears in towns and plays with the children. Drampa will protect kids when they're in danger, so their moms don't have to worry.

Generation VIII.Sword: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.
Generation VIII.Shield: Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until it's angered. When that happens, it stirs up a gale and flattens everything around.
Lake of Outrage Rolling Fields , Axew's Eye ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield Expansion Pass: Giant's Bed , Path to the Peak , Frigid Sea , Three-Point Pass , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle )
